sentences.en: An alternative approach to alcohols having two identical R groups ( q ) is to disconnect both at once.
sentences.cn: 另一可供选用的,通向具有两个等同R基 的醇 ( q ) 的办法是,将这两个R基一举全都切开.

sentences.en: Close test cock No.4. Disconnect bypass hose ( yellow ) at test cock No.4.
sentences.cn: 关闭测试旋塞4号. 断开测试旋塞4号上的旁路软管 ( 黄 ).

sentences.en: Disconnect both ends of the circuit or component to be measured.
sentences.cn: 断开待测电路或部件的两端.

sentences.en: Disconnect power cord for another 10 secs and then reconnect.
sentences.cn: 断开电源线10秒钟后再次接上电源线.

sentences.en: Disconnect the gauge glasses or fit a blind flange between them.
sentences.cn: 拆开水位玻璃管或者在两者之间装上盖板.

sentences.en: Disconnect the power mirror wire harness retainers from the inner door panel.
sentences.cn: 从内侧车门饰板断开电动视镜电线束扣件.

sentences.en: DO NOT DISCONNECT THE SPARK PLUG WIRES WHILE THE ENGINE IS OPERATING.
sentences.cn: 切勿在引擎工作时断开火星塞电线.

sentences.en: Extra settings for configuring BAD modems that cannot identify proper disconnect tone.
sentences.cn: 额外的设置,配置不好的调制解调器不能确定适当的断开的语调.

sentences.en: First, disconnect the boiler from the water mains.
sentences.cn: 先将锅炉与供水总管断开。

sentences.en: GAIN ACCESS TO THE BCM BODY 20 - WAY CONNECTOR BUT DO NOT DISCONNECT.
sentences.cn: 找出BCM车体20路接头,但不要将之断开.

sentences.en: If you don't pay your bills they'll disconnect your electricity / gas.
sentences.cn: 若不付费用,就要停止供应电力[煤气].

sentences.en: Remove the latch clip and disconnect the fuel supply hose.
sentences.cn: 拆卸锁闩扣夹并断开燃油供给软管.

sentences.en: The family agreed to disconnect her life support system.
sentences.cn: 家人同意切断她的生命维持系统。

sentences.en: We can therefore disconnect this bond ( 5 a ).
sentences.cn: 我们于是可以把这个键 ( 5a ) 切断.

sentences.en: When not using a battery, disconnect it from the device.
sentences.cn: 26当电池不使用时, 请把它从装置上取下.

sentences.en: You should disconnect the wireless set before you make adjustments inside it.
sentences.cn: 你应先拔掉无线电插头,再做内部调整.

words.tran_cn: 分离的；不连贯的；无系统的

trans.tran_en: to remove the supply of power, gas, water etc from a machine or piece of equipment

trans.tran_cn: 切断，断开，拆开，使（电话线路）中断
